text: Savannah Guthrie celebrated her son Charley's second birthday over the weekend with a homemade chocolate cake. The 46 - year - old mom took to Instagram on Saturday to pay tribute to her only son while sharing heartwarming pictures of her little boy and her four - year - old daughter, Vale, who helped make her little brother's birthday cake.'He has grown so much in 2 years. And my backing skills have... not grown. Even with a little helper this year!!'she joked in the caption.
